sect2.title: System.VirtualDatabases
sect2.para: This table supplies information about the currently connected virtual database, of which there is always exactly one (in the context of a connection).

sect2.title: System.Models
sect2.para: This table supplies information about all the models in the virtual database, including the system model itself (System).

entry.para: True if source model, false for view
Model supports queries with no criteria
Model supports queries with outer joins
Max number of values to pass in an IN value set for a dependent join
URI for the primary metamodel describing this model

sect2.title: System.ModelProperties
sect2.para: This table supplies user-defined properties on models based on metamodel extensions. Normally, this table is empty if no metamodel extensions are being used.

sect2.title: System.Groups
sect2.para: This table supplies information about all the groups (tables, views, documents, etc) in the virtual database.

entry.para: Name of this group in the source
True if this is a source model
Upper-case full group name for easier matching
True if group can be updated
Approximate number of rows in the group

sect2.title: System.GroupProperties
sect2.para: This table supplies user-defined properties on groups based on metamodel extensions. Normally, this table is empty if no metamodel extensions are being used.

sect2.title: System.Elements
sect2.para: This table supplies information about all the elements (columns, tags, attributes, etc) in the virtual database.

entry.para: Number of digits after the decimal point
Whether the length is fixed or variable
Element can be used in SELECT
Values can be inserted or updated in the element
Element is auto-incremented in the source
Java class that will be returned
Number of digits in numeric value

sect2.title: System.ElementProperties
sect2.para: This table supplies user-defined properties on groups based on metamodel extensions. Normally, this table is empty if no metamodel extensions are being used.

sect2.title: System.Keys
sect2.para: This table supplies information about primary, foreign, and unique keys.

entry.para: Name of key in source system

sect2.title: System.KeyProperties
sect2.para: This table supplies user-defined properties on keys based on metamodel extensions. Normally, this table is empty if no metamodel extensions are being used.

sect2.title: System.KeyElements
sect2.para: This table supplies information about the elements referenced by a key.

sect2.title: System.Procedures
sect2.para: This table supplies information about the procedures in the virtual database.

sect2.title: System.ProcedureProperties
sect2.para: This table supplies user-defined properties on procedures based on metamodel extensions. Normally, this table is empty if no metamodel extensions are being used.

sect2.title: System.ProcedureParams
sect2.para: This supplies information on procedure parameters.

sect2.title: System.DataTypes
sect2.para: This table supplies information on datatypes.

entry.para: Java class returned for this type

sect2.title: System.DataTypeProperties
sect2.para: This table supplies user-defined properties on data types based on metamodel extensions. Normally, this table is empty if no metamodel extensions are being used.
